Solution:   Increase timeouts.

patch 8.2.0383: wrong feature check causes test not to be run

Problem:    Wrong feature check causes test not to be run.
Solution:   Use CheckFunction instead of CheckFeature. (Ozaki Kiichi,
            closes #5781)

attachments.text: Problem: Wrong feature check causes test not to be run. Solution: Use CheckFunction instead of CheckFeature. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5781)

patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort()

Problem:    Error for possible NULL argument to qsort().
Solution:   Don't call qsort() when there is nothing to sort. (Dominique
            Pelle, closes #5780)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort() · vim/vim@bb65a56
attachments.text: Problem: Error for possible NULL argument to qsort(). Solution: Don't call qsort() when there is nothing to sort. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5780)
attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort() · vim/vim@bb65a56

Solution:   Use msg_attr_keep() instead of msg(). (closes #5782)

attachments.text: Problem: Delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode. Solution: Use msg_attr_keep() instead of msg(). (closes #5782)

patch 8.2.0390: terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky

Problem:    Terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky.
Solution:   Add delay in between sending keys.  Rename dump files.

attachments.text: Problem: Terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky. Solution: Add delay in between sending keys. Rename dump files.
